document_data.name: Hall of Winds
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hall of Winds''' was a tower located within the complex of the [[Palace of the Enlightened Throne]] in [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: Aptly named, the Hall of Winds was literally filled with raging winds that circled constantly within the tower structure. The Hall of Winds stood {{SI|80|ft|long=yes}}.
document_data.Activities: This tower housed the [[djinn]] who served the [[Grand Caliph]].
document_data.Inhabitants: In addition to the djinn, [[sylph]]s and [[aerial servant]]s were present to infuse the wind with pleasant scents anytime the djinn were in residence in the tower.
